scripts.start: sam local start-api --warm-containers EAGER --host localhost -p $PORT --docker-network sam-api-network -t cdk.out/TESTINGONLYNotesStack.template.json
scripts.start:detached: sam local start-api --skip-pull-image --warm-containers EAGER --host localhost -p $PORT --docker-network sam-api-network -t cdk.out/TESTINGONLYNotesStack.template.json > server.log 2>&1 & wait-port $PORT -t 15000
scripts.test:int: npm run assert-aws-cdk 2> /dev/null && (bash -c "export NODE_ENV=test PORT=3010; npm run synth:test && npm run start:detached && npm run test:int:run; npm run stop")  || echo 'AWS_CDK not set. Skipped integration tests'
scripts.test:int:w: bash -c "export NODE_ENV=test PORT=3010; npm run synth:test && npm run start:detached && npm run test:int:run:w; npm run stop"
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:int
scripts.lint: npm run type-check && npm run eslint
